channel.title: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug
channel.description:
When i try to attach a cable to a powerpole lamp, the game crashes. It crashes just when i look at the lamp with a cable in my hands.
Hope it gets fixed

item.title: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug
item.dc:creator: @AWARHERO AWARHERO
item.description:
@AWARHERO wrote:

Thanks a lot! This solved my issue and all those beautiful lights are now working!

Read full topic
item.source: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug

item.title: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug
item.dc:creator: @Totomio Totomio
item.description:
@Totomio wrote:

If you play Early Access branch you have to back to the 0.5.8 to make it work, the 0.5.10 version is for the experimental branch only.

Read full topic
item.source: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug

item.title: Light it Up - 0.5.10 - Power pole lamp bug
item.dc:creator: @Matthew_Perry Matthew Perry
item.description:
@Matthew_Perry wrote:

I too am experiencing this issue. I also find it happening to the ‘Refined Power’ Mod as well when trying to connect a cable to the MK1 Wind Generator.

Read full topic
